Wertung: 5 / 5
very old game but very good
It's just an offline mode for Counter Strike. What you're really here for is the Deleted Scenes (separate in the library) that are included for free, which is the cut campaign.
Melhor do que 1.6, melhor do que source.
Excellent gunplay, and better voicelines than CS:GO.
This will not fix your Gmod missing textures

Definitely late to the party on playing this version of Counter Strike but I found Condition Zero to be fun, enjoyable, with a somewhat active player base still and definitely did not regret sinking some hours into this game. If you are looking for the best Counter Strike experience I definitely wouldn't start here as I still find CSGO to be the best version of the game currently, but if you are looking for nostalgia and to play through all the games as a super fan though, you will have a lot of fun!

CS:CZ is just CS:1.6 with annoying challenges with bots so I will only talk about CS:CZ:DS

A gem to own, one of my childhood favorites
Uff este juego es una joya :3

The game is pretty good. But.... the players here are so friendly that they love your whole family. Here you can find your dad, and find out who took your mom to the movies. It's where 10-year-old geniuses from all over the world teach you about life, and help you build up your vocabulary. It's where your patience and stamina are tested. Here you can learn several languages. This is where the crayfish winters. This is where you're a king and a god, if your mother gave you a microphone. This is the place for you, and your clammy teammates!))))

the highly customizable single-player mission, messing directly with the BOTs, and "low-end" requirements make this game a good refresher if you're tired of playing competitively in the other titles. its classic mechanics is nostalgic and spray pattern? I don't think CS:CZ has any AFAIK.
El juego esta bueno pero es lo mismo que el counter normal pero con otras texturas
This isn't worth the time investment to be honest. The single-player is riddled with confusing maps and bad bots. Play 1.6 if you want multiplayer.

I personally think this game is way better than 1.6. It's like a small remaster, or a remake if I may say so, of CS 1.6, having better looking and higher resolution textures, updated player models, view-models and maps. Additionally, it comes with an extra game, that being the CS:CZ Deleted Scenes, a very nice single player campaign game.
